explanation: [0-0] In the kitchen, a man wearing a pink hat and a yellow T-shirt and a woman wearing a headscarf and a white T-shirt are sitting at a table. The man, with his mouth slightly open, looks to the right in surprise, while the woman smiles at the table. There are two pizza crusts and two empty plates on the table. Behind them is a range hood with stickers on it, white cabinets on both sides of the hood, and a toy hanging on the cabinet to the man's right.

[0-6] The woman places a pizza crust on the plate in front of the man. The man picks up the other crust and hands it to the woman. The woman takes the crust, puts it to her right, and then takes a smaller crust and places it on her plate. Then, the woman pinches her face with both hands and claps a few times.
